title: Systemvetardagen
description: A project to create a website for the Systemvetardagen event, which is a career fair for IT students. It was built using React with tailwindcss hosted with netlify.

title: Doalot AB
description: A website for a IT management company called Doalot AB. It's a Nextjs app with TinaCMS for content management. The website is hosted on Vercel.

title: SL Departure Kiosk
description: A web application that displays real-time departure information for public transport in Stockholm. It was created to be used at my Student Unions bar

title: Sorting Algorithm Visualizer
description: A web application that visualizes various sorting algorithms. It was built using React with tailwindcss and typescript

title: num2kana
description: Npm package to convert arabic numerals into kanji, hiragana or katakana, useful for learning to count in japanese.

title: APK Web Extension
description: Web extension for systembolaget.se to view and sort by APK value (Alcohol per krona)

title: Game of Life
description: Game of life is a cellular automaton devised by the British mathematician John Horton Conway in 1970. It is a zero-player game, meaning that its evolution is determined by its initial state, requiring no further input.
